Dispute_Type: Trademark use and enforcement of official mark
Legal_Issue: Enforceability of official marks under Trade-marks Act
Evidence_Assessment: Insufficient evidence of prior use of SPIRIT BEAR as an official mark
Burden_of_Proof: On public authority to demonstrate adoption and use prior to publication
Legal_Rule: Public authority must demonstrate adoption and use of an official mark before publication to enforce it
Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged infringement of official mark SPIRIT BEAR
Key_Evidence_Considered: Evidence (or lack thereof) of use of SPIRIT BEAR for wares or services prior to publication
Applicant_Challenge: City of Terrace and Kitasoo Band Council's motion for summary judgment
Court_Result: Motion dismissed; costs awarded to Urban Distilleries Inc.
Defendant_Response: Defense and counterclaim by Urban Distilleries Inc.
Remedy_Requested: Enforcement of official mark and cessation of use by defendant
Authority: City of Terrace and Kitasoo Band Council
Claimant_Status: Public authorities claiming official mark rights
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Lack of prior use of official mark
Applicable_Process: Federal trademark enforcement and judicial review
Outcome_of_Review: Claim rejected due to insufficient evidence
Governing_Rule: Use requirement for official marks under Trade-marks Act
